definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Hospital Union is a model of medical market.
sentences.chinese: 醫院間的聯合是醫療市場化的一種模式。

sentences.english: The price of the public shares' currency must be fair and marketable.
sentences.chinese: 公股流通的價格要公平和市場化。

sentences.english: Innovative proposal to set up "market-oriented institutional investors rights protection."
sentences.chinese: 創新性的提出成立“市場化的投資者維權機構”。

sentences.english: Nowadays the tendency of marketing is more and more obvious for media's advertising management.
sentences.chinese: 當今時代媒體廣告經營的市場化越來越明顯。

sentences.english: Based on the results of analysis, solutions to the marketization of China's mineral properties are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 根據分析結果，提出了中國礦業權市場化的解決辦法。

sentences.english: Marketing mechanism of merchandise wood is a kind of return to innate character.
sentences.chinese: 市場化機制是商品林經濟本質的迴歸。

sentences.english: The commerciality of the film has determined that it needs the characteristic of market-based operation.
sentences.chinese: 電影的商業性決定了它需要市場化運作的特點。

sentences.english: We also have other market-based tools at our disposal to help bring down the corporate debt ratio.
sentences.chinese: 而且我們還可以利用市場化的手段降低企業的債務率。

sentences.english: The soybean industry has almost marketized under economic globalization in China.
sentences.chinese: 在全球化背景下，中國大豆產業幾乎完全市場化。

sentences.english: The ongoing global reforms towards a market-driven electricity industry are still in the exploratory stage.
sentences.chinese: 世界各國的電力市場化改革還處於不斷探索階段。

sentences.english: In chapter I , I analyze the market-based tactic adopted in Feng Xiaogang's movie for greeting the New Year emphatically.
sentences.chinese: 上篇着重分析了馮小剛賀歲影片所採取的市場化策略。

sentences.english: Chapter 2 explores the amelioration of assets of National Land Corporations.
sentences.chinese: 第二章探討城市土地市場化經營條件下的資產改良。

sentences.english: They have embraced market reform of state schools.
sentences.chinese: 他們接受了公立學校的市場化改革。

sentences.english: This crisis tells us, the rapid marketability possibly has the question.
sentences.chinese: 這次危機告訴我們，迅速市場化可能是有問題的。

sentences.english: Commercialize reform, it is a revolution of discomfit system.
sentences.chinese: 市場化改革，就是打破計劃體制的一場革命。

sentences.english: Commercialize change change, it is a revolution of discomfit system.
sentences.chinese: 市場化改革，就是打破計劃體制的一場革命。

definition: to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
normalized (statistics)/to normalize (relations etc)/to become the norm
